title: Northeast Expedition
subtitle: Discover the untouched beauty of Northeast India
route: Guwahati - Shillong - Cherrapunjee - Dawki - Shillong – Kaziranga - Guwahati
description: Experience the breathtaking landscapes, unique culture, and natural wonders of Northeast India with our comprehensive 7-day tour package. From the bustling city of Guwahati to the misty hills of Shillong, the living root bridges of Cherrapunjee, the crystal clear waters of Dawki, and the wild adventures of Kaziranga National Park, this journey offers an unforgettable exploration of one of India's most beautiful regions.
highlights: 20+ Attractions Covered – Nohkalikai Falls, Krang Suri Falls, Double Decker Root Bridge & more
Hassle-Free Travel – Airport pickup & drop, deluxe hotel stay & camping in Dawki
Meals Included – Breakfast from Day 2-7 & dinner on Day 4
Scenic Experiences – Boat ride on Umngot River, Blue Lagoons & Asia's Cleanest Village
attractions: Nongriat Root Bridge (Double Decker Root Bridge)

itinerary.title: Arrival in Guwahati | Transfer to Shillong
itinerary.description: Arrive at Lokpriya Gopinath Bordoloi International Airport before 10 AM, where our guide will welcome you. Transfer to Shillong, the Scotland of the East. En route, stop at Umiam Lake for a peaceful boat ride or simply relax by its scenic waters. Explore the Don Bosco Museum, showcasing Meghalaya's rich cultural heritage. Visit Lady Hydari Park, known for its beautifully manicured gardens and mini-zoo. Take a leisurely stroll around Ward's Lake, a charming spot with landscaped gardens. Check in to your hotel and freshen up. Overnight stay in Shillong.

itinerary.title: Shillong to Cherrapunji
itinerary.description: Post breakfast embark on a scenic drive to Cherrapunji (approx. 2 hours). Admire the stunning landscapes of Laitlum Canyons, a paradise for nature lovers. Witness the breathtaking beauty of Elephant Falls. Enjoy panoramic views at Mawkdok Dympep Valley Viewpoint. Explore the mystical Garden of Caves and stop by Wah-Kaba Falls. Explore the mystical underground world of Arwah Caves. Check in to your accommodation in Cherrapunji and relax. Overnight stay in Cherrapunji.

itinerary.title: Cherrapunji Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Begin your day with a delicious breakfast in Cherrapunji. Witness the majestic Nohkalikai Falls, India's tallest plunge waterfall. Explore the mystical underground world of Mawsmai Caves. Admire the stunning Seven Sisters Falls. Trek to the iconic Single Decker & Double Decker Living Root Bridges also known as Nongriat Root Bridge, a marvel of nature. Enjoy trek to the Rainbow Falls. Visit the stunning Blue Lagoons, a hidden gem of Meghalaya. Return to your accommodation for a relaxing overnight stay in Cherrapunji.

itinerary.title: Cherrapunji to Dawki Via Mawlynnong
itinerary.description: Start your day with a hearty breakfast in Cherrapunji. Embark on a scenic drive to Dawki (approx. 2.5 hours). Explore living root bridges. Visit the charming Shnongpdeng Village and walk across the iconic Shnongpdeng Bridge. Marvel at the breathtaking Umngot River, famous for its crystal-clear waters. Enjoy a serene boat ride on the river (at your own cost). Explore the picturesque Mawlynnong Village, Asia's cleanest village. Enjoy dinner and overnight stay in well-appointed camps, soaking in the beauty of nature.

itinerary.title: Dawki to Shillong Via Jowai
itinerary.description: Start your day with a delightful breakfast in Dawki. Begin your journey back to Shillong, soaking in the scenic landscapes. Explore the breathtaking Phe Phe Waterfall, surrounded by lush greenery and diverse wildlife. Visit the India-Bangladesh Border for a unique cross-border experience. Witness the mesmerizing Krang Suri Falls in Jowai, known for its turquoise blue waters. Arrive in Shillong and check in to your hotel. Overnight stay in a comfortable hotel in Shillong.

itinerary.title: Shillong to Kaziranga
itinerary.description: After a hearty breakfast in Shillong, we'll begin our scenic drive towards the wild and wonderful Kaziranga National Park. The route treats us to stunning valley views and dense jungles that hint at the adventures ahead. Once we arrive, we'll check into a beautiful resort surrounded by lush greenery and the sounds of nature. The rest of the day is perfect for unwinding—explore the property, enjoy some leisure activities, or simply relax and soak in the peaceful vibe.

itinerary.title: Departure Day
itinerary.description: Enjoy a final breakfast in Shillong, cherishing the memories of your trip. After breakfast, drive to Guwahati and visit the sacred Maa Kamakhya Temple, one of the most revered Shakti Peethas in India. After the visit, we'll drop you at Lokpriya Gopinath Bordoloi International Airport for your onward journey. Bid farewell to the mesmerizing landscapes of Meghalaya as you head home with unforgettable experiences.

inclusions: Transportation for the entire trip by Tempo Traveller or Ertiga, Dzire
5 nights of hotel accommodation (2 nights in Shillong, 2 nights in Cherrapunji and 1 night in Kaziranga) on a double/triple sharing basis
1 night of camping accommodation in Dawki, including dinner
7 meals: Breakfast on Days 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 and 7; Dinner on Day 4
Driver's night charges, tolls, and parking fees included
Guide charges for the Double Decker Bridge is included
exclusions: Lunches and any meals not mentioned in the itinerary
Personal expenses such as phone calls, laundry, and shopping
Any charges for additional activities not specified in the itinerary
Boat ride fees on the Umngot River
Any kind of entry fees/ticket to attractions

description: Dive into the heart of Rajasthan with our custom Jaipur Udaipur tour package, where Jaipur’s royal forts meet Udaipur’s tranquil lakes. This 4-night, 5-day private journey offers cultural immersion, scenic drives, and 24/7 support for couples, families, or solo explorers craving a vibrant escape.
highlights: Private sedan for transfers and sightseeing
Amber Fort, City Palace, Lake Pichola, Saheliyon-ki-Bari

itinerary.title: Jaipur Arrival & Pink City Vibes
itinerary.description: Welcome to Jaipur, the Pink City! Check into your 3-star hotel and kick off with the grand Amber Fort, a hilltop marvel with intricate Sheesh Mahal. Marvel at Hawa Mahal’s pink facade and explore Jantar Mantar’s astronomical wonders. End with a vibrant stroll through Johari Bazaar for gems and street food. Savor a Rajasthani thali for dinner.

itinerary.title: Jaipur’s Royal Heritage
itinerary.description: Dive deeper into Jaipur’s legacy at City Palace, showcasing Mughal-Rajput architecture. Visit Nahargarh Fort for sweeping city views. Evening vibes at Bapu Bazaar offer handicrafts and mojaris. Enjoy a cultural show with dinner at a heritage restaurant.

itinerary.title: Scenic Drive to Udaipur
itinerary.description: After breakfast, journey to Udaipur, the Lake City. Check into a lakeside 3-star hotel and unwind at Lake Pichola, admiring Jag Mandir’s silhouette. Explore Bagore ki Haveli for a cultural dance show. Dinner features Mewari delicacies.

itinerary.title: Udaipur’s Lakeside Charm
itinerary.description: Start at City Palace, a majestic complex with lake views. Wander through Saheliyon-ki-Bari’s lush gardens and fountains. Visit Jagdish Temple’s carved beauty. Opt for a Lake Pichola boat ride (extra cost). Shop at Hathi Pol Bazaar in the evening.

itinerary.title: Udaipur Departure
itinerary.description: Post-breakfast, enjoy a quick stroll at Dudh Talai with lake views. Check out and transfer to the airport/station, carrying Rajasthan’s royal memories.

inclusions: Private sedan for transfers and sightseeing
exclusions: Optional activities (e.g., Lake Pichola boat ride)

itinerary.title: Bagdogra to Gangtok – Sikkim’s Vibrant Start
itinerary.description: Kick off from Bagdogra, driving 125 km (approx. 5 hours) through lush tea gardens to Gangtok. Check into a cozy 3-star hotel by evening. Stroll along MG Marg, soaking in the vibrant buzz and local flavors. Enjoy a warm dinner, ready for Sikkim’s charm.

itinerary.title: Gangtok – Cultural Delights
itinerary.description: After breakfast, visit Rumtek Monastery, a serene spiritual hub. Explore Enchey Monastery for its peaceful vibe. Post-lunch, stroll through the Flower Exhibition Centre, bursting with Himalayan blooms. End with a cable car ride for stunning Gangtok views. Return for a cozy dinner.

itinerary.title: Gangtok to Lachung – Alpine Adventure
itinerary.description: Post-breakfast, drive 120 km to Lachung (approx. 6 hours), a quaint Himalayan village. Check into a cozy 3-star guesthouse. Visit Lachung Monastery for a dose of serenity. Spend the evening soaking in the alpine charm by the Lachung River before dinner.

itinerary.title: Lachung to Gangtok – Yumthang Valley Bliss
itinerary.description: After breakfast, drive 25 km to Yumthang Valley, the “Valley of Flowers”. Marvel at its vibrant meadows and snow-capped peaks. Visit the hot springs for a warm dip. Return to Gangtok (120 km, ~6 hours) by evening for a relaxing dinner.

itinerary.title: Gangtok to Bagdogra – Farewell Journey
itinerary.description: After breakfast, drive 125 km back to Bagdogra (approx. 5 hours). Stop for lunch en route and arrive by afternoon, carrying memories of Gangtok’s buzz and Lachung’s serenity.

exclusions: Adventure activities (e.g., cable car, hot springs)

itinerary.title: Mumbai to Mangalore by Train
itinerary.description: Kick off your Coorg adventure with a late-night Sleeper Class train from Mumbai to Mangalore (~900 km, 16-18 hours). Board a comfortable sleeper class train (e.g., Matsyagandha Express) at 11:00 PM, guided by our Mumbai-based expert. Settle in for a cozy overnight journey, dreaming of Coorg's misty hills. Your guide shares tips to spark excitement for the adventure ahead. Distance: ~900 km. Time: 16-18 hours overnight. Notes: Pro Tip: Pack a light blanket for train comfort. Suggested Visual: Mumbai's bustling CST station at night. Meals & Overnight: Sleeper Class Train.

itinerary.title: Mangalore Arrival & Coorg's Warm Welcome
itinerary.description: Arrive in Mangalore by 3:00 PM, greeted by your guide and private vehicle. Drive to Coorg (~150 km, 4 hours), winding through the lush Western Ghats. Check into your 3-star Madikeri hotel, then visit Raja's Seat for stunning sunset views of misty valleys (45 mins). Explore Madikeri Fort's historic ramparts, steeped in Coorg's royal past (30 mins). Visit Omkareshwara Temple's serene Shiva shrine, blending Keralite and Islamic styles (30 mins). Savor a Kodava dinner with pandi curry at your hotel, buzzing with Coorg's charm.

itinerary.title: Coorg's Waterfalls & Wildlife Wonders
itinerary.description: After a hearty breakfast, dive into Coorg's natural splendor with your guide. Visit Abbey Falls, a cascading beauty amid coffee plantations (45 mins, 8 km drive). Explore Bhagamandala's sacred Triveni Sangam, where three rivers meet (1 hour, 36 km). Trek to Talacauvery, the Cauvery River's source, with serene temple vibes (1 hour). Lunch at a local eatery (own cost), then head to Dubare Elephant Camp to meet gentle giants (1 hour, 30 km). Wrap up with a coffee estate tour, learning about Coorg's brews (45 mins). Return to your 3-star hotel for a Kodava dinner.

itinerary.title: Coorg's Serenity & Return to Mangalore
itinerary.description: Post-breakfast, soak in Coorg's final delights. Visit Namdroling Monastery (Golden Temple) in Bylakuppe, a serene Tibetan settlement with golden statues (1 hour, 35 km). Explore Iruppu Falls' refreshing cascades, perfect for photos (45 mins, 80 km). Savor a local lunch (own cost), then drive to Mangalore (~150 km, 4 hours) for your late-night Sleeper Class train to Mumbai (~900 km, 16-18 hours). Your guide ensures a smooth departure, sharing Coorg's stories.

itinerary.title: Mumbai Arrival
itinerary.description: Arrive in Mumbai by morning (~7:00 AM), wrapping up your Coorg adventure. After breakfast on the train, bid farewell to your guide and group, carrying memories of misty hills and Kodava flavors. Our 24/7 support ensures a seamless return.
